processing: Processing. Please wait for the current operation to finish.
missing_fields: Fill in all required fields before adding a file.
value_not_exists_add_question: Value '{value}' does not exist in the extras list. Add it?
loc_download_failed: Localization files unavailable. Check repository access.
list_data_save_failed:
Failed to save data to list.xlsx:
{error}
operation_errors: Operation finished with errors. Check logs and backup folder: {backup}
ftp_send_failed:
Local data saved but uploading files to FTP failed.
Reason: {reason}
ftp_skipped_no_ean: Local data saved but images were not uploaded to FTP due to missing valid EAN-13 code.
sql_update_failed:
Local data and FTP updated, but database update failed.
Reason: {reason}
enter_ean_to_load: Enter EAN code to load data.
fill_required_before_open: Fill in all required fields (name, type, model, color 1) before opening the folder.
run_as_admin: Run with administrator privileges to edit these settings.
fill_required_before_submit: Fill in all required fields marked * before submitting.
ean_missing_prompt: No EAN provided. Enter a 13-digit EAN code or leave blank to use 'BRAK-EAN':
name_tooltip: Full furniture name without colors, type, or model, e.g., 'Maggiore', 'LUNA', 'SLANT'.
type_tooltip: Furniture type, e.g., 'CHEST', 'TV STAND', 'TABLE' (you can add length, e.g., 'TV STAND 100', 'WARDROBE 80').
extra_tooltip: Additional information, e.g., LED, RGB (leave empty if none).
ean_tooltip: 13-digit product EAN code. If not provided, 'BRAK-EAN' will be used.
excel_add_locked: Attempt to add '{value}' to list {list}, Excel file locked {reason}.
excel_add_save_failed: Failed to save Excel file (adding {value} to {list}): {error}
excel_remove_locked: Attempt to remove '{value}' from list {list}, Excel file locked {reason}.
excel_remove_save_failed: Failed to save Excel file (removing {value} from {list}): {error}
excel_entry_save_locked: Attempt to save entry EAN {ean}, Excel file locked {reason}.
excel_entry_save_failed: Failed to save entry EAN {ean} to Excel: {error}
remove_file_before_overwrite_failed: Failed to remove file {file} before overwriting: {error}
ftp_upload_skipped_settings: Skipped sending files to FTP (disabled in settings).
ftp_file_missing_no_delete: File {file} does not exist on FTP (no need to delete)
ftp_delete_error: Failed to delete file {file} on FTP: {error}
ftp_summary: FTP: uploaded {uploaded} files, deleted {deleted}, time {time} ms, status: {status}
sql_summary: SQL: queries {queries}, rows changed ~{rows}, time {time} ms
entry_updated_log: Updated entry: EAN={ean}, NAME={name}, TYPE={type}, MODEL={model}, COLOR1={color1}, COLOR2={color2}, COLOR3={color3}, EXTRAS={extras}
entry_added_log: Added new entry: EAN={ean}, NAME={name}, TYPE={type}, MODEL={model}, COLOR1={color1}, COLOR2={color2}, COLOR3={color3}, EXTRAS={extras}
excel_file_open: Cannot save list. Excel file is open {reason}. Close the file and try again.
excel_data_file_open: Cannot save data. Excel file is open {reason}. Close the file and try again.
